document_data.name: Pacify
document_data.mainbody: '''''Pacify''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[shugenja]] in [[Kara-Tur]]. The spell was very rare outside Kara-Tur.
document_data.Effects: This spell pacified creatures within the spell's area of effect. Once cast, harmful spells and weapons were unable to be used, and creatures could not physically impede other creatures. If a pacified creature was attacked by another creature who was not affected by the spell, the spell on the targeted creature was lifted.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components. During casting, the shugenja uttered several sutras.
